title: [Wasm] Add support for emscripten 2.0.23
body:
**Description of Change**

Adds support for newer emscripten builds.

**Bugs Fixed**

None

- Related to issue #

**API Changes**

None

**Behavioral Changes**

None

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation

comments.author: radical
comments.body: @mattleibow when will an updated package for this be available on nuget.org?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
It will go up in a few days. I have to wait for the release of .NET 6 preview 7 to go out as the Maui view packages now depend on it.

However, this does not mean you can't use the wasm bits right now. You can try it out if you add the preview feed https://aka.ms/skiasharp-eap/index.json to a nuget.config

I don't have exact dates, but is should be early August to hit nuget.org.
